title: Dear passive aggressive trolls
body:
It is not helpful advice to spam "(ffs/omg/omfg/wtf) please don't feed (champ)." and then blame everyone else when they die, and still blame everyone else if you die for feeding the enemy team enough to make your gg challenjour skills irrelevant. Saying 'please' does not make it any more justified when you have deaths too.

It is not helpful to spam danger pings to someone if you're having a fight with the enemy laner in the river between. They're not going to gank in the middle of a fight and you're just distracting yourself so you have an excuse to fail.

It is not helpful to ditch your lane and let the enemy team get a tower simply so you can enter a behind lane and leech their experience while spending most of the time standing still and typing out how much you're helping everyone, then blaming everyone when you die for going AFK while you're off writing a speech.

And it is definitely not helpful to waste your abilities, especially your ultimate, to 'accidently' kill steal someone who's behind and think you did the team a favour. Especially when you blame your team for letting your abilities go on cooldown when you die.

And finally, if you're a jungle or support that camps a lane or leaves the ADC at 2v1 to gank mid or even TOP, especially when it's in the middle of a standoff where both sides are too weak (mana or cooldowns) and the lane simply wants to farm, please don't call the laners bronze for playing safe, wasting your time and not going suicidal at each other when your humbling and trembling presence graces the lane.
---

What are your experiences with people who think it's alright to pretend to be helping the team while putting them on tilt?

replies.body: ffs dont feed yasuo and dont die so much noob

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QjjIwmEU,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-27T08:08:16.685+0000)
> And it is definitely not helpful to waste your abilities, especially your ultimate, to 'accidently' kill steal someone who's behind and think you did the team a favour. Especially when you blame your team for letting your abilities go on cooldown when you die.

I think you need to work on this point a bit. It can be really hard to ascertain whether enemies will  get away or win a duel. Quite a lot of players will really want to secure that kill for the team even if it means using an ability or even more rarely, an ultimate. 

You should try to view these situations as more of a team-effort rather then an individual getting the kill.
That's actually what I do. But getting blamed for assisting the enemy team by baiting allies into using abilities is ridiculous.

This is a detailed and thoughtful read if I am looking for theads about someone complaining about and blaming on something really hard, which in this case OP seems to suggest that a personality trait of passive aggressiveness is the root of his incompetence.

I rather sympathise with your circumstance to be honest, whatever it may be. I really do.
